alert.note: Alert for Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 8:35PM CDT until April 18 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Sucarnoochee River At Livingston affecting Sumter County. .Flooding is expected on the Sucarnoochee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sucarnoochee River At Livingston. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Flooding of farm lands around Livingston occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
